quoteText: Weâ€™re constantly trying to improve our Software, so we may need to change this Privacy Policy from time to time as well, but we will alert you to changes by placing a notice on justgetflux.com, by sending you a Notification (as described in more detail below), and/or by some other means.
title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
